posts.post_content:
Hi all. I have two T3 Turkey Red cards for sale:

Bill Carrigan and Harry Krause. 

It is $125 each, or $210 for the pair. I will cover shipping expenses.

Thanks!

Derek

Bill Carrigan is SOLD.

Krause still available, so feel free to shoot an offer my way.

Thank You.

Derek

Hi All. The Krause will be placed in an auction ending this Sunday. Thanks!
